name: Hive Protection
description:
You are a bee!

Hive Protection is a top-down shooter where you have to protect your hive by shooting down enemies that pose a threat to your survival, such as ants, hornets and even BEARS! 

There are a total of ten waves and, each wave, the number of enemies increase and the game gets increasingly harder.

How to play:
  • Point your cursor at enemies and left-click to shoot
  • Press [W], [A], [S], and [D] to move
